website_summaries.verdict: More than a basic tool bag, contractors and users of large, powerful tools will appreciate its design and build – but it's not the best choice for a basic tool collection.
pros: The combination of its rugged ballistic poly workmanship and wide, spacious interior make it a great pick for toting heavy-duty power tools
cons: Has fewer pockets than some other models, which makes it difficult to organize a variety of tools of different sizes
Compared to the sturdiness of the bag, the flimsy shoulder strap is surprising

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size as well
customer_reviews.text: **Update: I ordered this bag again and received the 12” bag again! Made call to Amazon for correction for second time. They instructed me to just keep it for my troubles. Buyers beware! Ordered 24” bag, received the 12” tradesman. Same issue as others. I probably got one of the bags someone else sent back that received wrong order as well.
customer_reviews.author: OkieAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Sewing Machine Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: The page for this bag also compares 3 other Dewalt bags. Those 3 bags are 18" wide compared with this 24" wide bag. The photos of those 3 bags, all of which have more pockets show more tools. This bag size is deceiving. This bag would hold a circular saw, 3 nail guns of different sizes, extension cord, and air hose. Most likely still have room for the cordless drill. Very well constructed, the seams, strap, pockets, easily hold the weight. My wife is using it for her sewing machine because I complained I didn't have enough tools to fill it. I should have ordered more tools and started a "Pro Contractor" business. It is a professional grade bag.
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

customer_reviews.title: This Is It
customer_reviews.text: One of the best buys I've made next to the DeWalt Combo Tool Set that fills up this bag. Don't buy another bag. This one is it. Durable, plenty of room...I still have room after throwing in a 7 tool cordless combo set with battering and chargers. Just remember the more you store the more you lift. No wheels on this bag so it's a matter of strength but with the high quality straps, including a shoulder strap, it's not a difficult task for the average man or woman. I'm buying another one, but the smaller version, just in case! For the price, you can't find a better bag.
customer_reviews.author: GWP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tool Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect!! Almost... It is large enough to fit all my tools. I'm a Milwaukee M18 Guy. But they dont make a nice large tool bag. I've Had 2 drills, hackzall, 7 1/4" skill saw, angle grinder, charger, 4- 5amp and 1- 12amp batteries, and my Pasload gun, and tool belt, and misc. tools. This weighs in at 95lbs!!! I'm able to carry it with the shoulder strap. But the original strap, had diecast hooks. Needless to say, they broke. I replaced the strap with a stronger one I had from a different tool bag. So far so good. the bag itself is well made, and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size...twice
customer_reviews.text: The first order I received was the wrong size bag. The replacement I received was also the wrong size. On both occasions, the item I received was the Dewalt 12" Tradesman's Tool Bag rather than the 24" Pro Contractor's Bag. The clear plastic bag was clearly labeled as the 24" bag , however the actual product was the 12" bag.
customer_reviews.author: TarHeel87

customer_reviews.title: Received Wrong product!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!! I DID NOT receive what was described, instead I received two small bags! I really don't know how or what the mix up was, i was so looking forward to getting what was described. I really needed a 24 inch Gear bag for my company tools. Now I have to send these things back and wait for a refund. Pictures included for proof!! Even the white tag says 24' gear bag. Someone must of wanted to play the "smart@$$" card and send two 12' small bags.
customer_reviews.author: Laura F.

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for my old toolcase
customer_reviews.text: I've been carrying the same toolcase for over a dozen years and it's getting more than a little beat up, inside and out. This bag seems to be great. I'm going to be honest with you, it'll probably be a couple o' four years before I can give it a really accurate rating. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Jack E. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great, spacious, durable bag
customer_reviews.text: Man, I love this bag! I got it as a Lightning Deal and I can't believe how much more expensive it is everywhere else. I got tired of having to carry multiple small bags and now my tools fit nicely - I can even fit a tarp in the bag if I have to. It's well-constructed of heavy duty material - not cheap, chintzy stuff - this is a solid bag; it will take a beating and keep going. Durability is key and this bag will last. Plenty of space - no issues there.
customer_reviews.author: NYCSteeler

customer_reviews.title: Forget paper or plastic. Look for Dewalt!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really big tool bag. Well made of heavy material. Sturdy handles and shoulder strap. Has two smaller outside covered pockets and two small open pockets on either end. Has two small open pouches inside, perfect for bit extensions and driver bits. Big enough to hold two drills, grinder, and saw with a couple of chargers and a flashlight. All with batteries, and still have room. Very happy with this bag. Better than the smaller nylon bags. Thanks Dewalt and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: GSD

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Made Well .. Large enough but Manageable !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oversized tool bag for my new Smith Professional Backpack NL402-4 Gallon Sprayer .. It fits perfect and zips closed including wand laid sideways and on edge .. I liked it so much I bought another one for all my spraying gear & accessories .. full face mask respirator and cartridges , rubber gloves, disposable coveralls supply etc etc .. I like to keep things organized and stored well (protected) as this equipment is expensive
customer_reviews.author: Edmundtell

customer_reviews.title: Being an electrician I have a good sided Greenlee bag and I would carry it along ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge! I understand that from the dimensions that it would be large, but it is a monster. Being an electrician I have a good sided Greenlee bag and I would carry it along with a belt, and a host of other tools. With this bag I carry my Greenlee bag and this bag and that's it. This bag holds a holesaw set, a corded hammer drill (case and all), my entire tool belt which is a four piece rig completely loaded with tools, plus all my misc. stuff such as shims, junction boxes, silicone, connectors and everything else. Awesome awesome bag. A lot bigger than my Greenlee bag and my coworkers Klein Ultimate Electricians bag.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb G.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Strap attachment
customer_reviews.text: Busted strap attachment upon arrival. This bag seemed thick and sturdy, but it was too large and too heavy and of course the broken strap attachment meant it was a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Large bag with tons of space. I had a regular dewalt 18 inch bag for four years and this will probably hold quadruple the amount of tools and it seems to be built for the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Caden W.

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best tool back I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I took a gamble on this bag after I couldn't secure the 24" Dewalt ballistics tool bag at a reasonable price. It paid off. The bag itself it made to last. I have one of EVERY 18V battery operated tool Dewalt sells in that bag and I STILL have room for hand tools, drill bits, spare batteries, and manuals. The pockets on the side are perfect for a set of bits, and the shoulder strap is comfortable, even with all the weight. I can't find a single complaint for this product after 6 months of heavy use. If you're looking for a contractors bag better than this, you're wasting your time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S.

customer_reviews.title: My Co-workers are jealous of my bag
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of different jobs, and this is by back of the truck go to bag for everything. I had a 20" Craftsman bag for over 18 years and it finally gave up the ghost on me. This Dewalt bag is very well constructed, everything about it screams heavy duty. I've got it loaded with my necessities like jumper cables, ratchet straps, nut drivers, trailer hauling accessories and more. It's still got room and doesn't give way when I slide it from the bed to the tailgate to grab what's needed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boulware

customer_reviews.title: You Pay For What You Get
customer_reviews.text: You pay for the name brand DEWALT & they deliver every time. Good quality, not cheaply made. Long lasting bag.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic Bag, Great Value
customer_reviews.text: First, this bag is huge! I fit the 5 piece Dewalt combo set, my everyday hand tools as a construction superintendent, lunchbox, and there’s room left for whatever else. You won’t need a bigger bag, it takes up the back floor of my supercrew with the seat folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Hampton Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely roomy!
customer_reviews.text: I like how much extra room you get in the 24 inch bag compared to the 20. I can get about 6 cordless tools,4 batteries a charger and all kinds of bits and attachments in there. The only thing I can think of that I would change about the bag is the length of the shoulder strap. It could be about a foot longer but hey it works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, bought for my boyfriend who does bathroom remodeling. He loves that he can fit everything he needs in it and has a durable strap to carry with
customer_reviews.author: morgan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty - ample space.
customer_reviews.text: Great heavy duty bag for carrying LOTS of tools. Interior pockets great for storing extra blades, bits, etc. Keeps all my tools in one easy to carry bag. Was able to fit the following Dewalt set with room to spare: Circular saw, hammer drill, impact driver, reciprocating saw, jig saw, grinder, 3 batteries, charger, spare blades and bits
customer_reviews.author: D. Zahajko

customer_reviews.title: Great size, fits all my 18 volt devices 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size, fits all my 18 volt devices 2 drills (hammer and right angle) 3 saws (Jig, cut off and sawzall) Right angle grinder, 2 flashlights, 6 batteries and 3 chargers with enough room for the blades and bits as well as enough common handtools to do any job.
customer_reviews.author: Runt

customer_reviews.title: Helps Reduce the Tool Clutter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday, mainly because he love most things Dewalt, and he loves it. When it arrived he said it was bigger than he thought but he uses it and it keeps all his tools in one place and keeps me happy that he can reduce the clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy - Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a monster bag. I purchased this for my concrete saw and accessories, but it has so much room and height over the 18" that I could fit two saws inside! Strong material and plenty of padding on straps. More pockets on outside than I have a use for!
customer_reviews.author: MARK A. DESALVO

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dang big!
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome bag. Just barely holds all my welding tools and PPE but its still zips shut so A+. The material feel heavy duty but only time will tell. The pockets leave something to be desired but I can live with it none the less. Overall very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rccolaman

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt 24in Bag
customer_reviews.text: Use it to haul around alot of tools from job to job. Fits my 2 Drills, Circular Saw, Charger batteries and still has plenty of space for more goodies
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: with all the dewalt tools i have its perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ,well built bag. It Is very big and will hold a lot of tools,if you have the back to pick it up when full
customer_reviews.author: A B Davidson

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great. Traveling on flights with lots of heavy tools
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great. Traveling on flights with lots of heavy tools. They get there in one piece. The shoulder strap is junk. Comfortable but broke at the chrome clips . Now have to outsource a new heavy strap.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Brand

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag however I think I got the wrong one because measuring it, nothing adds up to 24 inches.
customer_reviews.author: JR L.

customer_reviews.title: i love it!
customer_reviews.text: i can't live without this bag, i use it to carry my fittings here in the oil field, i love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rall

customer_reviews.title: Wish is had a tougher bottom given that its being placed on a number of different ground options.
customer_reviews.text: Wish is had a tougher bottom given that its being placed on a number of different ground options.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Got a 12" inch bag and this has happened before ...
customer_reviews.text: Got a 12" inch bag and this has happened before! They need to fix this issue!! Can't believe hey read reviews and don't fix the issue!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Cioe

customer_reviews.title: Huge absolutely huge
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need it for I put my circular saw Sawzall Grindr oscillator flashlight vacuum double charger and 6 batteries in there and still have room
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shoulder strap but nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag but shoulder strap broke first time I used it. It took two years to use the shoulder strap, but broke first time. The handles are sturdy which is what I usually use.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Really great bag!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is simply awesome. No shortage of space, super well made! Sturdy handle to hold the weight, shoulder strap if you need it...
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: All-in-bag
customer_reviews.text: This product came in the mail stream today. I gotta say that this contractors bag is durable and it can withstand all of my tools. I would definitely recommend this product for any DIY-er or simply plain contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Victor D

customer_reviews.title: DEWALT DG5511 24-Inch Pro Contractor's Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag, I have about every dewalt tool made in this bag, made of heavy gage material, I have about 7 tools and 10 batteries in it, its a life savor, I would recommend this seller, great shipping, was packaged good to be shipped. I would recommend this seller again, and I would buy from him again myself, thank you Don
customer_reviews.author: THE shitters broke

customer_reviews.title: WAY to Heavy bag.
customer_reviews.text: so heavy when empty. with tools in, you can't even lift it.
customer_reviews.author: c g

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very large. My 9 year old fit into it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Just a heads up, this is a very large bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the money that I got it for. And it is a very large bag!!!
customer_reviews.author: k. bliss

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag but a little bigger than my last one,but great quality
customer_reviews.author: robert hosking

customer_reviews.title: GOLD STANDARD FOR TOOL BAGS!!
customer_reviews.text: I was overwhelmed with the quality of this bag the stitching and durability if this bag is unmatched...it exceded my expectations and that's saying alot...if you have alot if tools this is the bag for you as it has alot of room...
customer_reviews.author: roosevelt little

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this thinking I would use it 4 tools.. Absolutely not.. this bag is so nice & big I use it wen I travel for my clothes, etc. Kind of pricey, but if U want a reliable bag this is it
customer_reviews.author: Ciròq Amaretto

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Nice big bag to hold all of my power tools. (those without a case). Built well and extremely rugged. I wish it had pockets on the inside or outside wall to hold smaller items (saw blades, drill bits, sandpaper, etc.) Carrying strap is padded and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, just not enough internal pockets
customer_reviews.text: A great, durable, high-quality bag, but just needed a few more extra pockets on the inside. The pockets that is does have aren't really deep enough to hold something longer than a medium sized screw driver. I have a few hand tools that are now free-floating in this bag (ex: jab saw. Not exactly the tool you want floating around your tool bag), and it takes a little longer to find them. Not really a big deal, just a minor inconvenience, hence the -1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than I was expecting. Very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy duty bag if you don't need organized.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very large bag to just throw stuff in, basically. Didn't really have any pockets meant to organize your tools. Not something you carry around. Nice bag though. I got one that had loose threads all over so I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact that it is large handles the tools ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it is large handles the tools I need daily very well and seems to be durable
customer_reviews.author: iamcw

customer_reviews.title: As many others have said, this bag is not ...
customer_reviews.text: As many others have said, this bag is not listed correctly. You will receive a 12" bag instead of a 24". Wish i would have read the reviews before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, very well built
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, very well built. For the contractor, excellent item to keep all your cordless tools and accessories together so that you can accomplish most any tasking. Large strong zippers, sturdy stiff bottom that has exterior strong rubberized coating that looks like it should last for quite sometime. I like the exterior pockets too, wish there were more! Even though i am only a hobby tinkerer, i feel i see & know quality products when i make a purchase. All in all, I rate this bag 5 stars so far!
customer_reviews.author: martin marotte

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Holds everyone of my Dewalt battery operated tools. Strong sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Nels

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Six plus battery powered tools and that many battery's too. A few drill bits and other things plus room to spare. Get this bag.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: We got the wrong bag twice in a row. ...
customer_reviews.text: We got the wrong bag twice in a row. Apparently we are not the only people with this problem, upon reading some other reviews. It's a shame because we really wanted the 24inch.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie noonan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Shoulder strap broke quickly but the actual bag is great.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamen M.

customer_reviews.title: I like the rest of the people received the wrong bag
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had read the reviews first. I like the rest of the people received the wrong bag. I got the 12” bag like everyone else. It looks like they could have fixed this problem. People were getting the wrong bag as far back as December
customer_reviews.author: Hollis Slade

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt
customer_reviews.text: I like all things Dewalt but this bag is just what I need for my cordless power tools it holds 5 tools 4 batteries and the accessories I need

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy!!! It’s big enough to fit all his power tools in and then some thank you.

customer_reviews.title: he really like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This was a christmas present for my son-in-law, he really like it a lot. It was pretty big and very sturdy as all dewalt products usually are.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A. Hardison

customer_reviews.title: Great item. Very large bag
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Very large bag. Work great for all my power tools to carry thanks.

customer_reviews.title: Very Large, Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very large height wise...which was the only reason for my return. However, it's very durable and would make a great tool bag for anyone that doesn't have to walk around with it on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: SPROUT

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag tow times and both times I one half the size

customer_reviews.title: but in a good way. Was very surprised at the size when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the father-in-law. It's HUGE, but in a good way. Was very surprised at the size when we opened and wrapped it. Will hold a lot of different tools & attachments. The father-in-law loved it for x-mas.
customer_reviews.author: mase

customer_reviews.title: i like it seems to be holding up
customer_reviews.text: its a big bag, i like it seems to be holding up well

customer_reviews.title: Most durable bag out there
customer_reviews.text: This bag is as durable as can be. I’m very impressed with carrying capacity.

customer_reviews.title: Too  large for me
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because it was too large, great quality though. I did an exchange for the 16" bag

customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge and holds a lot of power tools. I keep three drills, a circular saw and all the batteries with chargers and there is still plenty of room!

customer_reviews.title: A bag to store your tools and more!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big my hub loves it for all his hand tools.

customer_reviews.text: A great bag! Matches all my tools! This monster will almost carry more than you can carry!

I would suggest this Dewalt bag for construction workers that wants all of there power tools in one bag and it will hold essential tools for operation of the tools( ie. Chucks, saw blades, grinder wheel wrench, and drill bits etc.) . Also the bag is nice and tough, its made out of tuff materials. Overall the seller was honest and fast, and the product exceeded my expectations.

customer_reviews.text: Wrong size , do not order if you need a big bag. Quality was excellent but 1/2 the size it should have been , i returned it

product_meta.title: DEWALT DG5511 Pro Contractor's Gear Bag, 24 in.
product_meta.description:
The DEWALT 24" Pro Contractor's Gear Bag features an open design for easy access to the tool carrier and has a large interior compartment, including 4 individual parts pockets and one zippered pocket, and 4 exterior pockets/2 flap-covered, elastic straps to securely hold longer items and a hidden web sleeve, plus padded handles and an adjustable shoulder strap for easy carrying.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From 1924 to 2016 DEWALT continues to design and optimize professional workhorse solutions- tools, accessories and service - to ensure absolute confidence for the toughest jobsite conditions. WE are DEWALT, and we are GUARANTEED TOUGH.
feature_bullets: 4 EXTERIOR POCKETS: This DEWALT tool bag includes 2 flap-covered pockets plus one drawstring pocket to keep small parts from spilling out.
DURABLE TOOL BAG: This DEWALT gear bag is made with heavy-duty poly and ballistic poly fabric construction and includes base pads to protect bottom.
EXTRA-LARGE INTERIOR COMPARTMENT: This DEWALT tool bag provides superior carrying capacity, and includes 4 individual pockets and one zippered pocket to secure valuables.

COMFORTABLE TO CARRY: Adjustable, non-slip padded shoulder strap and large padded handles make carrying this tool bag more comfortable, plus convenience handles on each end for quick "from stow, to go".
OPEN DESIGN GEAR BAG: This DEWALT tool bag has an easy open design for easy access to the tool carrier and contents.
